title: Sample Time Trigger Function Block
description:
SCALE_B scales an input value BYTE and calculates an output value in
REAL. The input value X is limited here to I_LO and I_HI. SCALE_D (IN, 0,
255, 0, 100) scales an input with 8-bit resolution on the output 0..100.
name: SH_1

input.name: in
input.description: The input value to be output when the trigger condition is met.

input.name: PT
input.description: The time period that must elapse before the output is updated.

output.name: out
output.description: The output value that reflects the input when the trigger condition is met.

output.name: Trig
output.description: A boolean flag that indicates whether the output has been updated.
